skillTree.name: Anvil of Doom
skillTree.description: Covered in the Runelord’s ancient script, the anvil has given form to the most powerful runic weapons ever forged.

effects.description: Mount: Anvil of Doom

skillTree.name: Veteran Anvilguard
skillTree.description: Where the Anvil of Doom goes, so too does the Anvilguard, ever loyal and vigilant.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8
Melee defence: +8

skillTree.name: Runemaster
skillTree.description: Upon the Anvil of Doom the rune weapons of legend are forged.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%
Shared cooldown: -15% for all Master Rune Magic

skillTree.name: Greater Locus of Power
skillTree.description: The dense power exuded from the Anvil weighs heavily upon the minds of enemy Wizards.

effects.description: Replaces: "Locus of Power"
Ability: "Greater Locus of Power"

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Fiery Temper
skillTree.description: When facing a rage like this it's usually safest to run in the opposite direction. And quickly.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear
Cooldown: -20% for "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

skillTree.name: Exacting Standards
skillTree.description: "It must be perfect! Anything less is as good as useless!"

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +15% for Runesmiths
Passive ability: "Master Rune of Stromni Redbeard" for Runesmiths
Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic

skillTree.name: Ornery Overseer
skillTree.description: "Not like that, you wazzock!"

effects.description: Oathgold from Buildings: +200%
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
Construction time: -20% for all buildings

skillTree.name: Runic Talismans
skillTree.description: The magic is strong in these runes, bound together by a true master.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Master Rune of Spite"
Ward save: 5%
Passive ability: "Master Rune of Grungni"

skillTree.name: Proven Tools
skillTree.description: "If they were good enough for our glorious Ancestors, they're good enough for us!"

effects.description: Armour-piercing missile damage: +50% for Quarrellers units
"Rune of Burning" (projectiles cause explosive damage and reduce leadership) for Bolt Thrower units
"Flakkson's Rune of Seeking" (anti-large projectiles home in on targets) for Grudge Thrower units

skillTree.name: Runic Production Lines
skillTree.description: "Every new rune struck is a blow to our enemies!"

effects.description: Charge bonus: +7
Passive ability: "Frenzy"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"

skillTree.name: Damping
skillTree.description: The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"

skillTree.name: Rune of Hearth & Home
skillTree.description: Invoking the Rune of Hearth & Home stirs a Dwarf's pride in his Hold, Clan and Ancestors.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Rune of Hearth & Home"

skillTree.name: Wardbreaker
skillTree.description: Dawi Rune Magic is potent, and damned hard to defend against!

effects.description: Spell resistance: -10%
Missile resistance: -10%

skillTree.name: Strike the Runes
skillTree.description: A Runesmith may 'strike the runes' - a metaphor for refusing to let them cool, which reduces their potency.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic
Ability: "Rune of Oath & Steel"
Rune Magic: "Rune of Speed"

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description: Unit experience gain per turn: +75
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Axe Lord
skillTree.description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
Melee attack: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
Melee attack: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
Melee defence: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
Missile strength: +6% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
Ammunition: +15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
Missile strength: +8% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units

skillTree.name: Tradition & Innovation
skillTree.description: The Dawi continually push the boundaries of engineering, be it by soaring ever higher in their flying contraptions or firing projectiles farther than ever before.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
Ammunition: +15% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
Range: +5% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
Range: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units

skillTree.name: Fire & Fury
skillTree.description: Only Dwarfen forges burn hotter than those unfortunates caught in the blaze of Dawi ingenuity.

effects.description: Missile strength: +4% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
Missile strength: +6% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
Reload time reduction: +4% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
Missile strength: +8% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
Reload time reduction: +8% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units

skillTree.name: Grimnir's Heirs
skillTree.description: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
Weapon strength: +6% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
Melee attack: +6 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
Weapon strength: +12% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units

skillTree.name: Thunderer
skillTree.description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

effects.description: Missile strength: +6% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
Ammunition: +10% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
Missile strength: +6% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
Ammunition: +20% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
Missile strength: +8% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
Ability: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Blessed by Grungni
skillTree.description: Those who pass the trials of the Ancestor God have proven their honour without question.

effects.description: Armour: +12 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
Spell resistance: 15% for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Dawi Firepower
skillTree.description: None know the strength of the Dawi better than those who've suffered their firepower firsthand.

effects.description: Missile strength: +12% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
Reload time reduction: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Honoured by Grimnir
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs worship Grimnir, but only a select few warriors receive his personal recognition.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Morgrim’s Favoured
skillTree.description: Morgrim's favour is not handed out on a whim; this god blesses only the truest disciples of Dawi engineering.

effects.description: Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +12% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
Reload time reduction: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
Ability: "Stand Your Ground!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Miner's Instinct
skillTree.description: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +6%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +16%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +30%

skillTree.name: Wall Master
skillTree.description: What a Dwarf doesn't know about defending a Hold isn't worth knowing.

effects.description: Attrition: +5% when under siege
Attrition suffered by defender: +8% when laying siege or encircling
Attrition: +15% when under siege
Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
Attrition: +20% when under siege

skillTree.name: Pure-Beard
skillTree.description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

effects.description: Corruption: -1
Corruption: -2
Corruption: -3

skillTree.name: Mason
skillTree.description: Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

effects.description: Construction cost: -2% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Construction cost: -5% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Construction cost: -9% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

skillTree.name: Iron-Willed
skillTree.description: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Inspirational Leader
skillTree.description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +2%
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
Casualty replenishment rate: +6%

skillTree.name: Unflappable
skillTree.description: Nothing escapes this Dwarf's gaze; no movement, no trap, nothing.

effects.description: Ambush defence chance: +20%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%
Ambush defence chance: +40%

skillTree.name: Enquiring Mind
skillTree.description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Research rate: +10%

skillTree.name: The Old Ways Are Best
skillTree.description: Thorek does not abide new technology, using ancient techniques to lend his council and strong arm to the cause of the old Dwarf Empire.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3
Reload time reduction: +15% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, and Quarrellers units
Armour: +10
